posts.message: Find this spot in Brooklyn! The first 500 people to #ShowUp between 4:30-7pm will win free tickets to see Rihanna at the #GCFestival on September 24th in Central Park! Game. On.
The first round of Rihanna's fall collection as creative director for Puma is available today! Get with it: smarturl.it/RihannaPUMA #FENTYXPUMA
